meanings.definition: A person or thing that splashes.
meanings.sent1: The playful puppy was a real splasher in the puddles.
meanings.sent2: The kids at the pool were splashing each other with water.
meanings.sent3: The splasher at the beach accidentally soaked everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The rainstorm turned the streets into a splasher's paradise.
meanings.sent5: The little girl giggled as she became a splasher in the bathtub.

meanings.definition: A decorative piece placed behind a sink to protect the wall from water splashes.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen had a beautiful ceramic splasher behind the sink.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom splasher added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent3: The splasher in the bathroom matched the tiles perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The splasher in the kitchen looked like a piece of art on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The new splasher in the bathroom made cleaning up water spills easier.
